title: The Compact Powerhouse: Vivo X300
description: The vivo X300 stands out as a compact flagship smartphone that combines innovative technology with a sleek, ergonomic design. Priced at $699, it caters to users who prioritize high performance, innovative camera capabilities, and durability in a compact form …
